entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Rock Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:17 AM PST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High zero.
